description.en:
This mod allows staying on and moving around on vehicles while they are being driven by the AI or another player.
The following features currently work in a somewhat stable way: - Sticking to the trailer while the player is not moving - Moving on the trailer with a constant speed in any direction - Auto-rotating with the vehicle as it's turning
The following features are still buggy: - Players face different directions on their own screen and on other people's screens - When starting to move and stopping, the player zaps around a bit - Carrying objects currently requires superstrength, otherwise you'd lose them as soon as you start moving
